abstract: McKinney, Tex, Police Chief Greg Conley says Cpl David Eric Casebolt, who was documented on video pulling gun on teenagers and roughly handling young black girl at pool party, has resigned, but that he also remains under investigation; video set off latest in number of debates across country on police tactics and race.
lead_paragraph: The officer, Eric Casebolt, was seen throwing a 14-year-old girl to the ground and pointing a gun at other teenagers.

headline.main: McKinney, Tex., Police Officer Resigns Over Incident Caught on Video
headline.print_headline: Officer Quits After Clash at Pool Party Near Dallas

snippet: The officer, Eric Casebolt, was seen throwing a 14-year-old girl to the ground and pointing a gun at other teenagers.
